alert.note: Alert for Foster (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 8:22PM CDT until April 24 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in North Dakota... James River near Grace City affecting Foster County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River near Grace City. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Right bank overflows. At 13.0 feet, Left bank overflows. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage on Monday. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.0 feet on 05/03/2013. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
